title: "Technology company Peterborough will receive a grant of £ 95,000 to develop an AI product to help the healthcare industry"
excerpt: "NDG Artificial Intelligence Ltd (NDGAI), founded by Peterborough entrepreneur Nigel Gittins, has received the funding to develop new technology for the oppressed healthcare industry. Innovate UK’s investment will fund a prototype called RoutifAI that will be an essential part of NDGAI’s first artificially intelligent product,"
